category: Breaking news from AFRICA, Maghreb and Sub-Saharan Africa - France 24

media.alt: Tanzania President Hassan wins disputed election amid deadly protests

title.en: Tanzania President Hassan wins disputed election amid deadly protests

excerpt.en: Tanzanian President Samia Suluhu Hassan won a landslide election victory, official results showed Saturday. The opposition Chadema party, barred from taking part in the poll, said that hundreds ofâ€¦

title.en: Holders Nigeria lead qualifiers for 2026 Wafcon

excerpt.en: Reigning champions Nigeria qualify for next year's tournament alongside Cape Verde and Malawi who will make their Women's Africa Cup of Nations debut.

title.en: Briton Okolie to headline 'historic' card in Nigeria

excerpt.en: British heavyweight Lawrence Okolie is set to headline a card in Nigeria in December, saying it "will be a historic moment for Africa, my family and my career".
